scripts.build:amd64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o replacciato-linux-amd64 main.go
scripts.build:windows:amd64: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o replacciato-windows-amd64-cli main.go
scripts.build:macos:amd64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o replacciato-macos-amd64-cli main.go
scripts.build:arm: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -o replacciato-linux-arm64 main.go
scripts.build:windows:arm: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=arm64 go build -o replacciato-windows-arm64-cli main.go
scripts.build:macos:arm: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o replacciato-macos-arm64-cli main.go
scripts.build:all: mkdir -p dist && npm run build:amd64 && npm run build:windows:amd64 && npm run build:macos:amd64 && npm run build:arm && npm run build:windows:arm && npm run build:macos:arm && mv replacciato-* dist/
